item.title: Overview suicide
item.description: According to the WHO Suicides organization, 800.000 committed suicide in 2018. This means every 40 seconds a person dies by suicide. This number is fortunately dropping. In this kernel I want to explore the evolution of suicide rate using the dataset provided here on Kaggle. I’ll be using the powerful R language to do this analysis, my main focus is to understand what affects the suicide rate to decrease.
